title: 1.6.2的服务器崩溃，哪位大神来帮我看看错误报告？谢谢！
txt_content:
错误报告：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Everything's going to plan. No, really, that was supposed to happen.

Time: 14-2-23 下午6:34
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.RuntimeException:

        ----------------------------------------
        Download Player API MCPC+ from:
                http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/738498-/
        and install it on your system to fix this specific problem.

跪求大神帮助！

replies.author: evanfang
replies.txt_content: 把压缩包放进服务端的mods文件夹里面还有你.minecraft的mods文件夹里面，就是两个mods文件夹都放那个压缩包

replies.author: cihaoyi
replies.txt_content: 给个蹦服时的后台截图ok？

replies.author: evanfang
replies.txt_content: 只需要下载player API就行了。

replies.author: 基金酷话
replies.txt_content:
1784234383 发表于 2014-3-5 20:59
真的？我试试！
直接整合包http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-241393-1-1.html
